about_the_game: Trash Magnate is a game about a budding entrepreneur ready to stake their claim in the world. By collecting garbage, recycling items, gathering resources and selling items for profit this fledgling business owner will found and grow the greatest recycling facility the world has ever seen.

short_description: Complete missions. Make critical business decisions. Upgrade your facility how you see fit. Expand your customer base. Adjust your rates. Balance pollution, customer satisfaction, and profits.
